devdoc.author: Jordan Loh Shu Peng

buyCompanyShares(address,uint256).details: issue a buy transaction on the exchange. Note amount param! because we defined price as per ether unit of shares,  we must divide the price by 1 ether unit  when we calculate the cost to the buyer as amount is given in wei

params.amount: amount of shares to buy in wei units
params.company: address of company that MUST be listed in listedCompanies

buyExchangeToken().details: allows user to use ether to exchange 1 to 1 for exchange tokens note that the ether must be carried in a msg.value

createCompanyAndList(string,string,uint2.details: allows user to create a company and list on exchange

params.name: of company cannot be empty string
params.price: in EE$ per ONE ETH unit of shares in uint256.  1 price = 1 wei EE$ per share OR 0.000000000000000001 EE$ per ONE ETH unit of shares
params.symbol: of company cannot be empty string

delistCompany(address).details: allows owner to delist an entity on exchange

exchangeTokenBalance().return: the exchange token balance of a user

exchangeTokenStaked().return: the exchange token allowance given to the exchange

initialize(address,address,string,string.details: this function is called by the proxy on initialization NOTE: logic owner MUST be different from proxy owner  Read more at: https://blog.openzeppelin.com/proxy-patterns/

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

listCompany(address,uint256).details: allows owner to list an external ERC20-compliant entity on exchange

params.price: in EE$ per ONE ETH unit of shares in uint256.

numberOfOwnedCompanies().return: number of companies the msg.sender owns on exchange

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sellExchangeToken(uint256).details: allows user to exchange their exchange tokens for ether user must provide an allowance for the exchange to transferFrom

params.amount: amount of exchange tokens to sell

switchOpenMode(bool).details: emergency stop open function used by owner

params.value: true to open, false to close

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCompanyPrice(address,uint256).details: updates the price of a listed company.

params.company: address of company that MUST be listed in listedCompanies
params.price: in EE$ per ONE ETH unit of shares in uint256.  1 price = 1 wei EE$ per share OR 0.000000000000000001 EE$ per ONE ETH unit of shares

upgradeCompanyFactory(address).details: allows owner to provide a new company factory

devdoc.title: A Decentralized exchange of ERC20 Tokens (Private Securities) that uses an internal exchange Token for pricing between tokens
